Package hr.fer.zemris.java.tecaj.hw4.db

Simple database emulator.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IFilter
    Class for all possible filters of Student records.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LastNameFilter
    Implements filter for student record last name regex with only one wildcard char '*' last name query.
    StudentDatabase
    Class contains HasMap instance of all the students submitted trough list of strings.
    StudentDB
    Program reads file from current directory from file database.txt.
    StudentRecord
    Class representing one row of the emulated database.

Package hr.fer.zemris.java.tecaj.hw4.db Description

Simple database emulator.

We will emulate a database form file "database.txt". Database will be a base of student records. Attributes are: jmbag, lastName, firstName, finalGrade. Each row in database will be an instance of StudentRecord.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Igor Petkovski
